Text.Page:
Neacal's got me keeping an eye on the caravan route, but that doesn't mean there's not work to do.

Foledus lost profits from a whole shipment when the {@LinkCreature:3#300142#devan warriors} attacked. They've probably still got it on them. See if you can recover it. You'll make that castanic's tiny heart sparkle with avaricious glee!

Foledus'll be right pleased with your work. Run back to Bulwark Camp and give him the good news.

And if he has any spare ale, bring me some.
Pick a deva, any deva. Odds are good they've got his loot.

Blast and damnation! I thought I'd never get these back! Thanks! Bloody devas are always ruining it for others.

If I get back to town and set up shop, I promise you first pick of the best merchandiseâ€”wholesale!
